comment:
* Request to retrieve the Low-level Signalling Tables (LLS) and Service-layer Signalling (SLS) * metadata. * *

For more details on each type of metadata that can be requested, refer to the ATSC standard * A/344:2023-5 9.2.10 - Query Signaling Data API. * * @see SignalingDataResponse

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_APD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: APD for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_USBD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: USBD for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_STSID
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: S-TSID for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_MPD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: DASH MPD for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_USD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: User Service Description for MMTP

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_PAT
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: MMT Package Access Table for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_MPT
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: MMT Package Table for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_MPIT
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: MMT Media Presentation Information Table for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_CRIT
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: MMT Clock Relation Information for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_DCIT
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: MMT Device Capabilities Information Table for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_HELD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: HTML Entry Pages Location Description for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_DWD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: Distribution Window Desciription for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_AEI
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: MMT Application Event Information for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_VSPD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: Video Stream Properties Descriptor

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_ASD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: ATSC Staggercast Descriptor

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_IED
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: Inband Event Descriptor

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_CAD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: Caption Asset Descriptor

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_ASPD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: Audio Stream Properties Descriptor

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_SSD
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: Security Properties Descriptor

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_EMSG
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: ROUTE/DASH Application Dynamic Event for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_EVTI
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: MMT Application Dynamic Event for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_RSAT
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: Regional Service Availability Table for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_RDT
variables.comment: SLS Metadata: Recovery Data Table for the requested service(s)

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_SLT
variables.comment: * Service List Table for the requested service(s), LLS_table_id = 1.

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_RRT
variables.comment: * Region Rating Table for the requested service(s), LLS_table_id = 2.

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_STT
variables.comment: * System Time Table for the requested service(s), LLS_table_id = 3.

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_AEAT
variables.comment: * Advance Emergency Information Table for the requested service(s), LLS_table_id = 4.

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_OSN
variables.comment: * Onscreen Message Notifications for the requested service(s), LLS_table_id = 5.

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_SMT
variables.comment: * Signed Multitable for the requested service(s), LLS_table_id = 0xFE (254).

variables.name: SIGNALING_METADATA_CDT
variables.comment: * CertificateData Tablefor the requested service(s), LLS_table_id = 6.

variables.name: SIGNALING_DATA_NO_GROUP_ID
variables.comment: * Denotes that theres no group associated with this request.

methods.name: public int getGroup()
methods.comment:
* Gets the group with which any signaling returned will be associated. * *

Requested metadata objects will only be returned if they are part of the group specified. * *

If no group is specified ({@link #SIGNALING_DATA_NO_GROUP_ID}), * the receiver will send all the metadata objects discovered. * * @return The group ID which any signaling returned will be associated.

methods.name: public List<String> getSignalingDataTypes()
methods.comment:
* Gets the signaling data types for which data should be retrieved. * *

For more details on each type of metadata that can be requested, refer to the ATSC * standard A/344:2023-5 9.2.10 - Query Signaling Data API. * * @return The signaling data types for which data should be retrieved.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull android.os.Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull android.os.Parcel dest, int flags)
